commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: There won't be any more of those things we saw just now, right? Urgh, even the auditorium's pitch black. You're being so thorough when you really don't need to be...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: If I set out to do something, I'm gonna put all of my focus into it. Rina-chan Board says, "Serious!"

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Now then, I wonder just what will jump out at us here?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I'd really prefer for nothing to jump out at us if possible...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Um, the next place you'll be going to is...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Eep!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Eek!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Th-This is a bit too... *Whimper*

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: A bit too what?

commands.speaker: Umi, Ruby, Kotori, Riko, Kasumi
commands.line: GYAHHHHH!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: *Huff* *Puff*

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Um, shall we take a short break?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Please. My throat's bone dry from all of that screaming.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Sob* I need to go to the restroom before that...

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Phew... The life's been breathed back into me.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I'm much more tired than I thought I was.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I'm still scared. I'm terrified. I wanna call my sister...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I wanna call the Prez myself.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm getting some really good data from all of you guys. Just keep at it for a little longer.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I can't keep at this for much longer!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Knowing that everything is fabricated still strikes real fear in my heart. Haunted houses these days really have come a long way.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I truly understand what Rina meant by getting hold of the latest technology.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Ahaha... I'm sure the haunted house will earn a reputation for being horrifying when it's all finished.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Umi, Kotori, thanks. But if I'm gonna get this done, then I want to strive for even greater heights.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: When is the haunted house due to be completed?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: In six months' time at the earliest.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Is that so? With so much technology involved in this project, I am very much looking forward to its completion, despite how scary it may be.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'll invite you all when it's complete.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: P-Please don't go out of your way to treat us... Ahaha...
